blogPost.title: Sri Lankan Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe will oversee the election of an interim president following President Gotabaya Rajapaksa’s resignation, the country’s parliamentary speaker said https://t.co/4OByPNxLRI
blogPost.author: The Wall Street Journal

previous.title: More than half the U.S. population lives in counties where Covid-19 cases and hospitalizations are high enough that people should wear masks in indoor public settings, according to Centers for Disease Control and Prevention data https://t.co/IKEZKnOwux

localize.full_text: 米国疾病対策予防センターのデータによると、米国人口の半数以上が、Covid-19の患者数と入院数が、屋内の公共の場でマスクを着用する必要があるほど多い郡に住んでいます。https://t.co/IKEZKnOwux
根据美国疾病控制和预防中心的数据，超过一半的美国人口生活在科维德-19病例和住院人数较多的县，人们在室内公共场合应戴口罩，https://t.co/IKEZKnOwux。
根據美國疾病控制和預防中心的數據，超過一半的美國人口生活在科維德-19病例和住院人數較多的縣，人們在室內公共場合應戴口罩，https://t.co/IKEZKnOwux。
